title: Experimental Conditions for Disease Annotation
description: An experimental condition can be a combination of text descriptions and ontological assignments used to represent the conditions under which the disease annotation occured.

textCondition.description: free text describing the environmental/experimental condition.

anatomicalId.description: anatomical ontology identifier used in cases like regeneration/wounding.

geneOntologyId.description: gene ontology id used in subset of zeco terms.

NCBITaxonId.description: NCBITaxon ontology id used in subset of zeco terms.

ChebiOntologyId.description: Chebi ontology id used in subset of zeco terms.
